entries.text: The European Central Bank (ECB) manages monetary policy, through which it aims to influence the cost and availability of money in the economy.

entries.title: What are the ECB's monetary policy instruments? - Banco de España
entries.text: The main instrument is the set of key interest rates, which it steers through open market operations, standing facilities and minimum reserve requirements.
